title: Japan Money Supply M0
description: Money Supply M0 in Japan increased to 114787 JPY Billion in October from 114594.40 JPY Billion in September of 2022. Money Supply M0 in Japan averaged 45218.76 JPY Billion from 1967 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 114787 JPY Billion in October of 2022 and a record low of 2130.10 JPY Billion in February of 1967. Japan Money Supply M0 is the most liquid measure of the money supply including coins and notes in circulation and other assets that are easily convertible into cash. Money Supply M0 and M1, are also known as narrow money. This page provides - Japan Money Supply M0 - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Bank of Japan
